Others: Jalen Suggs left the game in the second quarter due to back spasms and was ruled out for the rest of the match.
The injury occurred when Suggs went for a steal and fell to the floor, grabbing at his lower back.
A wheelchair was brought onto the floor to help Suggs off the court.
The Magic were up 56-41 at the time of Suggs' injury.
Arena Conditions: The game was played at Scotiabank Arena in Toronto.
